name: Fishdom
description:
Fishdom - the amazingly addictive and popular match 3 game!

Thrilling maritime-themed puzzles await you in a beautiful underwater world.

Playing in your own customizable aquarium, complete countless tricky match 3 levels to earn new fish, awesome underwater decorations, food dispensers and much more.

Classic, highly-addictive match 3 gameplay Over 100 unlockable bonuses and accessories Build the aquarium of your dreams and win various trophies
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
